forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a blanket of bright sunshine, with temperatures gently swaying around a pleasant 69 degrees. The air feels invigorating, caressed by a west-southwest breeze that dances between 7 to 14 mph, occasionally gusting up to 21 mph, lending a spirited touch that stirs the leaves of nearby trees and rustles the corners of jackets worn by strolling urbanites. There’s a clarity to the day that suggests a crispness in the atmosphere, making it more than suitable for leisurely pursuits.

As evening approaches, the sky will transition into a soft tapestry of partial clouds, with nighttime temperatures settling comfortably at around 59 degrees. This change invites a subtle shift in attire—perhaps a light sweater or jacket for those venturing out after dark, as the evening air may become a tad cool. Given these splendid conditions, one might choose to join friends at a charming outdoor café, basking in the sun over a warm drink. Alternatively, a walk along the waterfront could provide a tranquil escape, allowing the rhythm of the bay to soothe the soul as twilight begins to softly embrace the city.
